translated: Judas would have received 30 pieces of silver, or thirty - the price of a field - for this "work" and becoming aware of his act, he would be hanged.
original: Judas aurait reçu 30 pièces d'argent, ou trente  — le prix d'un champ — pour ce « travail », puis prenant conscience de son acte, il se serait pendu.
